description:
Mr. Lewd Talk and Yakyuken Lover team up, and then Draluc tells Ronaldo about how he and John met.
Source: Funimation

titles.title: Shin-Yoko Battle Royale / John Meets Draluc / Waiting for Love
Shin-Yokohama Battle Perveroyale / John rencontre Draluc / En attendant l`amour
Shin`yoko Battle Royale / John Meets Draluc / Waiting for Love
シンヨコ・バトル・ロY[ワイ]ヤル / John meets Draluc / Waiting for LOVE
